>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.classes.Item.uEsMXIfzQFhnx6ez]{Envoy, Enhanced}

You’ve developed a knack for giving a specific type of midcombat encouragement. At 2nd level, choose one of the following envoy improvisations: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.YMCpBDLSA6feLBen]{Clever Feint}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.spGhGxCjrJUQP9v8]{Dispiriting Taunt}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.bP820PAOJUQ1dcLP]{Get ‘Em}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.4i1U9YQgb2tgN748]{Inspiring Boost}. If you do not have that improvisation already, you gain it. If you do have it, you can instead gain a different improvisation for which you qualify.

At 6th level, you can use the chosen improvisation as though you had spent 1 Resolve Point without having to spend a Resolve Point. You can do this once per day for every 6 envoy levels you have.
